Now let's play devil's advocate and say that the girl in the video is the grandmother; this would explain a lot of things like why the girl in the video reminded mc of fmc enough to have delusional fantasies since they looked to be at around the same age and looked very similar, where the mc's mother got her looks and where her behavior from her younger days came from, why both the mother and fmc seem to have an instinctually heavy attraction towards guys with a specific build, why the girl in the video states to have a different cup size than fmc but the guy still addresses the girl by fmc's family name, etc. Also the reason why mc has ntr delusional fantasies is probably due to genetics because his father also had a similar experience when mc's mother was explaining to the father her first encounter with a man's large reproductive organs, everything that the characters do seems to be linked by their genes assuming that the grandmother video theory is true.

I did some thinking/theorizing (god help me) and I've noticed that there's a chance that Mc might've jerked off to his grandmother without knowing it. First off the guy that's in the AV appears to be relatively tall, has a muscular build and above-average sized reproductive organs - all traits that the Mc's mother and sister/aunt seem to consider their preference in terms of sexual compatibility so one can assume that the same applies to the grandmother. Second is that the grandmother was very close to around Fmc's current age when she had Mc's mother: [(grandmother's current age 62) - (Mc's mother current age 45) = 17] so the grandmother was around 16-17 years old when she conceived Mc's mother.  Finally there's the matter of the AV guy's hair color [I'm assuming it's blonde, I'll feel like an idiot if I'm wrong] and bangs which appear to be almost exactly, if not extremely similar, to the Mc mother's hair back when she was younger.
